hero.name: Portfolio
hero.heading: Khamare Clarke
hero.description: I’m a skilled Web and App developer, dedicated to building fast, reliable digital solutions that make an impact. With a focus on SEO, paid ads and smart strategies, I help businesses boost their online presence and attract more customers through targeted traffic and cutting-edge technology.

about.title: EXPERT IN WEB & APP DEVELOPMENT WITH SEO AND PAID ADS SPECIALISATION
about.description: With over 15 years of experience, I specialise in creating high-performance web and app solutions designed to elevate your online presence. From developing robust websites and custom, apps to implementing effective SEO strategies and targeted paid ads, I provide comprehensive digital solutions to help you achieve your business goals and drive measurable results.

details.title: High-Performance Web and Mobile App
details.description: As the Senior Full Stack Developer for MyApproved, I built and deployed a scalable, high-performance web and mobile app using React and MongoDB. Key achievements include implementing secure user authentication, real-time notifications, and integrating Stripe for payments. I optimized the platform for SEO and speed with Next.js, and deployed it on Vercel with automated CI/CD pipelines, enhancing user engagement and boosting revenue.

details.title: High-Performing WordPress Website
details.description: As the Lead Manager for UpgradeRoofs, I developed a high-performing WordPress website and managed their ads campaigns. Key achievements include building a custom, responsive WordPress theme, optimizing the site for SEO and speed, and integrating lead generation tools. My targeted ads campaigns significantly increased conversions and drove quality traffic, boosting online visibility and customer engagement.

details.title: Responsive Aesthetic Services Website
details.description: As the Senior Developer for Yenique Aesthetics, I built a responsive website using React.js, Node.js, and Bootstrap. Key features include a visually appealing design, detailed service integration, a user-friendly online booking system, and on-page SEO strategies, resulting in a high-performing platform that effectively promotes Yenqui Aesthetics.

details.title: Integrated Marketing Campaign Website
details.description: As the Senior Developer for Surity Agency, I built a responsive dental agency website using React.js, Next.js, and Bootstrap. Key achievements include implementing server-side rendering for fast load times, integrating interactive features for user engagement, and optimizing the site for SEO, resulting in an efficient, user-friendly platform that effectively promotes Surity Agency's dental services.

details.title: Comprehensive CRM Automation System
details.description: As the Senior Developer for QueensBeautyClinic.co.uk, I created a custom Shopify site optimized for speed, SEO, and mobile responsiveness. Integrated booking forms boosted lead generation, and managed targeted ads campaigns increased traffic and client bookings, improving the clinic’s online presence and customer engagement.

details.title: Tailored Web Application for Client Management
details.description: As the Senior Developer for Skin First Hair and Beauty, I built a modern, responsive website to showcase the salon's services. Key achievements include integrating an online booking system, optimizing site speed, and implementing SEO strategies to enhance visibility, resulting in an effective platform that improves customer engagement.
details.langages: HTML, CSS, JS, React JS, Node.js

details.title: Responsive Courier Services Website
details.description: As the Senior Developer for Nelly's Logistics, I created a responsive website using HTML, CSS, JavaScript, and PHP that streamlined the booking and management of courier services. Key features include an integrated online booking system, real-time package tracking, and optimized performance, enhancing customer satisfaction.

allExperience.companyDescription: Omni Digital Solutions is a cutting-edge digital agency specializing in innovative web and app solutions. Our dedicated team focuses on delivering high-quality products and services that empower businesses to thrive in the digital landscape through strategic growth and exceptional user experiences.

SEO Clinic Solutions is a leading web development agency dedicated to crafting customized digital experiences. We harness the latest technologies and industry best practices to enhance user engagement and optimize business performance, driving measurable results for our clients.

Treq-Prim Tech is an innovative startup focused on developing impactful web applications and services. Our mission is to empower businesses with modern technological solutions, utilizing cutting-edge frameworks and best practices to ensure success in the digital marketplace.

allTestimonial.reviewText: Working with Khamare Clarke has single-handedly transformed our Business. His expertise in web development and SEO and has ads helped us gain a consistent flow of new clients daily. Highly recommended!
I was impressed by the seamless integration of paid ads with our web strategy. Khamare Clarke not only delivered a stunning website but also increased our ROI significantly.
The automation package Khamare Clarke developed for us streamlined our operations and saved us countless hours. Their attention to detail and commitment to our success made all the difference.
allTestimonial.avatarCompany: COO, Skin First Hair and Beauty
